title: When someone is new to the boards

replies.body:
Hmmm... I just noticed... the rainbows are coming out from under the keyboard and not from the computer screen... probably because they're coming from the actual computer system under the desk.

WOOT! ACCURACY IN MEDIA!

No one finds the gifs anywhere.
They all steal from each other. :^)

http://i.imgur.com/9rM8Ppl.gif[/img]

No one finds the gifs anywhere.
They all steal from each other. :^)


http://i.imgur.com/9rM8Ppl.gif[/img]

https://media.tenor.co/images/d38837642506643f0b01d327021224fd/raw

Alright, you got me. I was gonna do the "big reveal" later, but I guess now is good as ever.

http://i.imgur.com/3alu4M7.gifv?noredirect
It is. I pulled the wool over all your eyes (thank goodness we don't have a Yi main or that would be a lot of eyes).
cough I'm a yi main cough

Even better question: How do you even get the gif to be displayed in boards?

i once tried making a custom gif for meme long ago. Got [downvoted](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/OfNuT9qL-when-you-outplay-your-enemy-and-carry-hard) due to gif not displaying ~~and the meme itself being terrible~~ for some reason.
Just upload it to a file hosting site like giphy, and then the paste the gifs URL on the boards.

the gif u r using for this post is from imgur, and the one i created was also uploaded to imgur.

Added "?Noredirect" on the URL just like u did on this post, and for some reason it wont display
Post it here, let me see what went wrong. There is a max size of 20mb. Imgur also uses .gifv as well as .gif, which is technically a video file.

http://i.imgur.com/XaCooEh.gif?Noredirect
weird, it works on here but not on my original [post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/OfNuT9qL-when-you-outplay-your-enemy-and-carry-hard), any clue to why it is like that? Or is it just bugged?

It is too big I believe. Try using it as a ,gifv format. With most imgur files, you can delete the ?Noredirect at the end, and a v instead. Here is your gif in .gifv format. 
http://i.imgur.com/XaCooEh.gifv
thx a lot, now i can actually make more usable custom gifs

I would phrase it more as "is there anything here but salt and memes?"

but that's just me

The correct grammar is: 

"Where the fuck do you guys find all these gifs with which to perfectly communicate?"

Thaz my gif to yu.
I am of the firm belief that only "Goons" know where to find / make the perfect gifs. If you have ever been to "Something Awful" you know what I am talking about.

When I find a cringey gif but I have to use it.

http://31.media.tumblr.com/1e5ec9e606fd5d41f7cbe57eba20b277/tumblr_moige9zZcP1qmqrhlo1_500.gif
